contest-event.event-date:
July 10, 1937 D Sunderland Contest
Sunderland Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
sunderland-contest
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Victoria Hall, Sunderland Choice of test pieces: "Recollections of Bellini" or "Recollections of Auber"
Prizes - 1st £8 and cup, 2nd £4, 3rd £2, 4th £1. March contest - 1st Shildon(£1), 2nd(10s.) Brancepeth.
Promoted by Southwick Fete Committee. 11 bands competed.
Jan. 13, 2014, 1:03 p.m. Jan. 18, 2019, 3:14 p.m.
